resources.string: U-Turm is the former headquarter of Union Brewery. The tower was built in 1926/27, the U is on the roof since 1968. Until 1994 it was in operation and after many sellings of the area and the building itself the city of Dortmund bought the tower in 2007. In 2008 the city decided to rebuild the tower for RUHR.2010. In 2010 it was reopened in parts and it still is not finished yet.
